subject: Cannot see test summary report
msgSnippet: Hi,   I am new JUnit.   I am executing JUnit tests through maven. I see result text files for each ..java file that has @Test methods.   However there is no
messageBody:
Hi,
 
I am new JUnit.
 
I am executing JUnit tests through maven. I see result text files for each ..java file that has @Test methods.
 
However there is no summary of how many tests were executed, passed or failed.
 
How and where can I see a summary test execution report?
 
Thanks!




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
